definition: any projection that is thought to resemble a human arm
details:
noun
- any projection that is thought to resemble a human arm
= synonyms: arm
- the graduated arc that is attached to an instrument for measuring angles
= example: the graduated arc that is attached to an instrument for measuring angles
- either of the two halves of a bow from handle to tip
= example: either of the two halves of a bow from handle to tip
- one of the jointed appendages of an animal used for locomotion or grasping: arm
- (astronomy) the circumferential edge of the apparent disc of the sun or the moon or a planet
- any of the main branches arising from the trunk or a bough of a tree
= synonyms: tree branch
